languages.text: {n}Не поведя и бровью, Соломон командует:{/n} "Глейто — голос. Не каждого кибермастифа приветствует Вольный Торговец лично, надо ответить на оказанную честь".

{n}Without so much as a flicker in his expression, Solomorne commands,{/n} "Glaito, speak! Not every cyber-mastiff receives a personal greeting from a Rogue Trader — such an honour warrants a response."
languages.original_text: {n}Не поведя и бровью, Соломон командует:{/n} "Глейто — голос. Не каждого кибермастифа приветствует Вольный Торговец лично, надо ответить на оказанную честь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Without so much as a flicker in his expression, Solomorne commands,{/n} "Glaito, speak! Not every cyber-mastiff receives a personal greeting from a Rogue Trader — such an honour warrants a response."

{n}Without so much as a flicker in his expression, Solomorne commands,{/n} "Glaito, speak! Not every cyber-mastiff receives a personal greeting from a Rogue Trader — such an honour warrants a response."

{n}Without so much as a flicker in his expression, Solomorne commands,{/n} "Glaito, speak! Not every cyber-mastiff receives a personal greeting from a Rogue Trader — such an honour warrants a response."

{n}Without so much as a flicker in his expression, Solomorne commands,{/n} "Glaito, speak! Not every cyber-mastiff receives a personal greeting from a Rogue Trader — such an honour warrants a response."

languages.text: {n}Sin el más mínimo cambio de expresión, Solomorne ordena:{/n} «¡Glaito, habla! No todos los cibermastines reciben un saludo personal de un Comerciante Independiente. Tal honor merece una respuesta».
languages.original_text: {n}Without so much as a flicker in his expression, Solomorne commands,{/n} "Glaito, speak! Not every cyber-mastiff receives a personal greeting from a Rogue Trader — such an honour warrants a response."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sin el más mínimo cambio de expresión, Solomorne ordena:{/n} «¡Glaito, habla! No todos los cibermastines reciben un saludo personal de un Comerciante Independiente. Tal honor merece una respuesta».

languages.text: {n}听到这句话，索罗蒙几乎没有片刻犹豫，以命令的口吻开了口。{/n}“快答话，格雷托！不是每只生化獒犬都能得到行商浪人的亲自问候，这样的荣耀可不能不答复。”
languages.original_text: {n}Without so much as a flicker in his expression, Solomorne commands,{/n} "Glaito, speak! Not every cyber-mastiff receives a personal greeting from a Rogue Trader — such an honour warrants a response."

traits.locale_text: {n}听到这句话，索罗蒙几乎没有片刻犹豫，以命令的口吻开了口。{/n}“快答话，格雷托！不是每只生化獒犬都能得到行商浪人的亲自问候，这样的荣耀可不能不答复。”

languages.text: {n}Sans se départir un seul instant de son expression imperturbable, Solomorne aboie :{/n} « Parle, Glaito ! Tous les cyber-mastiffs n'ont pas le privilège d'être salués par {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} en personne. Un tel honneur mérite une réponse. »
languages.original_text: {n}Without so much as a flicker in his expression, Solomorne commands,{/n} "Glaito, speak! Not every cyber-mastiff receives a personal greeting from a Rogue Trader — such an honour warrants a response."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sans se départir un seul instant de son expression imperturbable, Solomorne aboie :{/n} « Parle, Glaito ! Tous les cyber-mastiffs n'ont pas le privilège d'être salués par {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} en personne. Un tel honneur mérite une réponse. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの表情の中にはほとんど動きがなく、彼が指示を出す。{/n}「グライト、話せ！すべてのサイバーマスチフがローグトレーダーからの個人的な挨拶を受けるわけではない。そのような光栄には対応が必要だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Without so much as a flicker in his expression, Solomorne commands,{/n} "Glaito, speak! Not every cyber-mastiff receives a personal greeting from a Rogue Trader — such an honour warrants a response."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの表情の中にはほとんど動きがなく、彼が指示を出す。{/n}「グライト、話せ！すべてのサイバーマスチフがローグトレーダーからの個人的な挨拶を受けるわけではない。そのような光栄には対応が必要だ」

languages.text: {n}Surat ifadesinde en ufak bir değişiklik yaşanmayan Solomorne, bir anda emrediyor.{/n} "Konuşsana Glaito! Her siber mastif, Hür Tacir tarafından selamlanma şerefine nail olmaz. Karşılık vermek icap eder."
languages.original_text: {n}Without so much as a flicker in his expression, Solomorne commands,{/n} "Glaito, speak! Not every cyber-mastiff receives a personal greeting from a Rogue Trader — such an honour warrants a response."

traits.locale_text: {n}Surat ifadesinde en ufak bir değişiklik yaşanmayan Solomorne, bir anda emrediyor.{/n} "Konuşsana Glaito! Her siber mastif, Hür Tacir tarafından selamlanma şerefine nail olmaz. Karşılık vermek icap eder."

languages.text: {n}Ohne eine Miene zu verziehen, befiehlt Solomorne: {/n} "Glaito, sprich! Nicht jeder Cyber-Mastiff wird von {mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin} begrüßt ... eine solche Ehre verlangt nach einer Antwort."
languages.original_text: {n}Without so much as a flicker in his expression, Solomorne commands,{/n} "Glaito, speak! Not every cyber-mastiff receives a personal greeting from a Rogue Trader — such an honour warrants a response."

languages.original_text: {n}Without so much as a flicker in his expression, Solomorne commands,{/n} "Glaito, speak! Not every cyber-mastiff receives a personal greeting from a Rogue Trader — such an honour warrants a response."
